title: Did Disney Release This ‘Hocus Pocus 2’ Movie Poster?
subtitle: Interest in a Disney sequel to the 1993 comedy horror film "Hocus Pocus" remained strong in 2015.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Disney confirmed the film "Hocus Pocus 2" was in production in 2015, more than 20 years after the release of the original "Hocus Pocus."
